title: Ghostspeak amulet

properties.value: A ghostspeak amulet is an item worn in the neck slot that enables the wearer to talk to ghosts. Partial completion of The Restless Ghost is required to obtain the item, as it is given to players by Father Urnhey in order to speak to the ghost haunting the Lumbridge graveyard during the quest.

A ghostspeak amulet is an item worn in the neck slot that enables the wearer to talk to ghosts. Partial completion of The Restless Ghost is required to obtain the item, as it is given to players by Father Urnhey in order to speak to the ghost haunting the Lumbridge graveyard during the quest.

An enchanted ghostspeak amulet is given to players by the old crone in order to control Necrovarus during the Ghosts Ahoy quest.

Players who have completed the Morytania Medium Diary may use Morytania Legs in place of a Ghostspeak Amulet anywhere it is required, except during the miniquest The General's Shadow as the ghostly robes must be worn.

Players who have lost their amulet may obtain another one from Father Urnhey.

Uses[edit | edit source]

Quests[edit | edit source]

Aside from The Restless Ghost, the ghostspeak amulet is required for the following quests: Animal Magnetism, Nature Spirit, Ghosts Ahoy, Making History, Creature of Fenkenstrain, A Fairy Tale Part I, Cabin Fever, Dragon Slayer II, and A Night at the Theatre. It is also used in the miniquests Curse of the Empty Lord, The General's Shadow, and Hopespear's Will.

Miscellaneous[edit | edit source]

The ghostspeak amulet is also necessary for talking to any ghost NPC in Port Phasmatys, although players who have completed Ghosts Ahoy can pass through the entry barrier without it. Players who haven't finished the quest will need to wear the amulet when passing through (the toll is 2 ecto-tokens).

In addition, the amulet allows players to speak to the ghosts in Melzar's Maze on the second floor. The conversation is about their experience of Elvarg's destruction; they were stationed at Rimmington.

Under typical circumstances a player can only get one ghostspeak amulet as Father Urnhey will not give an amulet to player who has one in their possession, though the drop trick can be used to obtain more than one.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 July 2015
(update)

A ghost during the Ghosts Ahoy quest now only speaks ghost when you do not have a ghostspeak amulet equipped.

22 May 2006
(update)

The items were graphically updated with the rework of The Restless Ghost.

26 January -
27 June 2005

The item's inventory sprite was slightly adjusted.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The ghosts found by the Grave of Scorpius can be spoken to without a ghostspeak amulet.
  • Upon completion of the Ghosts Ahoy quest, any duplicates of the enchanted ghostspeak amulet, whether in one's inventory or bank, will NOT be lost.

Partial completion of [[The Restless Ghost]] is required to obtain the item, as it is given to players by [[Father Urnhey]] in order to speak to the [[Restless ghost|ghost]] haunting the [[Lumbridge]] graveyard during the quest. An enchanted ghostspeak amulet is given to players by the [[old crone]] in order to control [[Necrovarus]] during the [[Ghosts Ahoy]] quest. Players who have completed the Morytania Medium Diary may use [[Morytania legs 2|Morytania Legs]] in place of a Ghostspeak Amulet anywhere it is required, except during the miniquest [[The General's Shadow]] as the [[ghostly robes]] must be worn. Players who have '''lost''' their amulet may obtain another one from [[Father Urnhey]]. {{Infobox Bonuses |version1 = Normal |version2 = Enchanted |astab = 0 |aslash = 0 |acrush = 0 |amagic = 0 |arange = 0 |dstab = 0 |dslash = 0 |dcrush = 0 |dmagic = 0 |drange = 0 |str = 0 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = 0 |slot = neck |image1 = [[File:Ghostspeak amulet equipped female.png|110px]] |image2 = [[File:Ghostspeak amulet (enchanted) equipped female.png|110px]] }} ==Uses== ===Quests=== Aside from The Restless Ghost, the ghostspeak amulet is required for the following quests: [[Animal Magnetism]], [[Nature Spirit]], [[Ghosts Ahoy]], [[Making History]], [[Creature of Fenkenstrain]], [[A Fairy Tale Part I]], [[Cabin Fever]], [[Dragon Slayer II]], and [[A Night at the Theatre]]. It is also used in the miniquests [[Curse of the Empty Lord]], [[The General's Shadow]], and [[Hopespear's Will]]. ===Miscellaneous=== The ghostspeak amulet is also necessary for talking to any ghost NPC in [[Port Phasmatys]], although players who have completed [[Ghosts Ahoy]] can pass through the entry barrier without it. Players who haven't finished the quest will need to wear the amulet when passing through (the toll is 2 [[ecto-token]]s). In addition, the amulet allows players to speak to the ghosts in [[Melzar's Maze]] on the second floor. The conversation is about their experience of [[Elvarg]]'s destruction; they were stationed at [[Rimmington]]. Under typical circumstances a player can only get one ghostspeak amulet as Father Urnhey will not give an amulet to player who has one in their possession, though the [[drop trick]] can be used to obtain more than one. ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 23 July 2015 |update = Big Cats & WWF |change = A ghost during the [[Ghosts Ahoy]] quest now only speaks ghost when you do not have a [[ghostspeak amulet]] equipped. }} {{Subject changes |date = 22 May 2006 |update = Royal Trouble |change = The items were graphically updated with the rework of [[The Restless Ghost]]. }} {{Subject changes |daterange = 26 January -
